languages.text: "Это немыслимо! Мы, Великий Регент, надеялись на честный суд и подобающее поведение Вашей Светлости согласно законам Простора! Посему... мы глубоко разочарованы, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "Это немыслимо! Мы, Великий Регент, надеялись на честный суд и подобающее поведение Вашей Светлости согласно законам Коронуса! Посему... мы глубоко разочарованы, Вольный Торговец".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "This is unthinkable! We, the Great Regent, were hoping for a fair trial and proper decorum from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in accordance with the laws of the Koronus Expanse! Therefore... we are deeply disappointed, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Это немыслимо! Мы, Великий Регент, надеялись на честный суд и подобающее поведение Вашей Светлости согласно законам Простора! Посему... мы глубоко разочарованы, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "This is unthinkable! We, the Great Regent, were hoping for a fair trial and proper decorum from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in accordance with the laws of the Koronus Expanse! Therefore... We are deeply disappointed, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "This is unthinkable! We, the Great Regent, were hoping for a fair trial and proper decorum from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in accordance with the laws of the Koronus Expanse! Therefore... We are deeply disappointed, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "This is unthinkable! We, the Great Regent, were hoping for a fair trial and proper decorum from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in accordance with the laws of the Koronus Expanse! Therefore... we are deeply disappointed, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "This is unthinkable! We, the Great Regent, were hoping for a fair trial and proper decorum from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in accordance with the laws of the Koronus Expanse! Therefore... we are deeply disappointed, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "This is unthinkable! We, the Great Regent, were hoping for a fair trial and proper decorum from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in accordance with the laws of the Koronus Expanse! Therefore... we are deeply disappointed, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “这简直是不可想象！我们，大摄政王，本以为能从大人您这里得到公正的审判结果与合适的礼节，我们本以为审判程序会符合科罗努斯扩区的律法！因此……我们深感失望，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "This is unthinkable! We, the Great Regent, were hoping for a fair trial and proper decorum from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in accordance with the laws of the Koronus Expanse! Therefore... we are deeply disappointed, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “这简直是不可想象！我们，大摄政王，本以为能从大人您这里得到公正的审判结果与合适的礼节，我们本以为审判程序会符合科罗努斯扩区的律法！因此……我们深感失望，行商浪人。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «¡Esto es inconcebible! ¡Como regente, esperaba un juicio justo y el decoro apropiado por parte de mi{mf|lord|lady}, conforme a las leyes de la Extensión de Koronus! Por lo tanto... es una gran decepción, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "This is unthinkable! We, the Great Regent, were hoping for a fair trial and proper decorum from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in accordance with the laws of the Koronus Expanse! Therefore... we are deeply disappointed, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «¡Esto es inconcebible! ¡Como regente, esperaba un juicio justo y el decoro apropiado por parte de mi{mf|lord|lady}, conforme a las leyes de la Extensión de Koronus! Por lo tanto... es una gran decepción, Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「こんなこと、あり得ぬ！我ら大摂政は、コロヌス・エクスパンスの法に従い、あなたが公正な審判と適切な礼儀を持って振る舞うことを期待していた！しかしこれでは…我らは深く失望している、自由開拓者」
languages.original_text: "This is unthinkable! We, the Great Regent, were hoping for a fair trial and proper decorum from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in accordance with the laws of the Koronus Expanse! Therefore... we are deeply disappointed, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「こんなこと、あり得ぬ！我ら大摂政は、コロヌス・エクスパンスの法に従い、あなたが公正な審判と適切な礼儀を持って振る舞うことを期待していた！しかしこれでは…我らは深く失望している、自由開拓者」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Das ist unvorstellbar! Wir, der Große Regent, hatten auf einen fairen Prozess und Anstand seitens Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} gehofft, in Übereinstimmung mit den Gesetzen der Koronus-Ausdehnung! Und darum ... sind wir zutiefst enttäuscht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "This is unthinkable! We, the Great Regent, were hoping for a fair trial and proper decorum from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in accordance with the laws of the Koronus Expanse! Therefore... we are deeply disappointed, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist unvorstellbar! Wir, der Große Regent, hatten auf einen fairen Prozess und Anstand seitens Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} gehofft, in Übereinstimmung mit den Gesetzen der Koronus-Ausdehnung! Und darum ... sind wir zutiefst enttäuscht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « C'est impensable ! Nous, vénérable régent, comptions sur un procès équitable de Votre Seigneurie, en accord avec les lois des Étendues de Koronus ! Nous sommes extrêmement déçus, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "This is unthinkable! We, the Great Regent, were hoping for a fair trial and proper decorum from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in accordance with the laws of the Koronus Expanse! Therefore... we are deeply disappointed, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « C'est impensable ! Nous, vénérable régent, comptions sur un procès équitable de Votre Seigneurie, en accord avec les lois des Étendues de Koronus ! Nous sommes extrêmement déçus, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Böyle bir şey söz konusu bile olamaz! Biz, Yüce Naip olarak Koronus Enginliği kanunlarınca adil bir yargılama ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nden usulüne uygun muamele görmeyi umuyorduk! Derin bir hayal kırıklığı içindeyiz Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: "This is unthinkable! We, the Great Regent, were hoping for a fair trial and proper decorum from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} in accordance with the laws of the Koronus Expanse! Therefore... we are deeply disappointed, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Böyle bir şey söz konusu bile olamaz! Biz, Yüce Naip, Koronus Enginliği kanunlarınca adil bir yargılama ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nden usulüne uygun bir muamele görmeyi umuyorduk! Derin bir hayal kırıklığı içindeyiz Hür Tacir."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
